skills.name: Corkage Fee
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Gallagher's ATK to a single target enemy.

skills.name: Special Brew
skills.desc: Immediately heals a target ally for <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak></color> HP.

skills.name: Champagne Etiquette
skills.desc: Inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for <unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak> turn(s). At the same time, deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies, and enhances this unit's next Basic ATK to Nectar Blitz.

skills.name: Tipsy Tussle
skills.desc: The Besotted state increases the Break DMG that targets receive by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[f1]%</unbreak></color>. Every time a Besotted target is attacked by an ally, the attacker's HP gets restored by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[i]</unbreak></color>.

skills.name: Artisan Elixir
skills.desc: Immediately attacks the enemy. Upon entering battle, inflicts Besotted on all enemies, lasting for <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s). And deals Fire DMG equal to <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak> of Gallagher's ATK to all enemies.

skills.name: Nectar Blitz
skills.desc: Deals Fire DMG equal to <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak></color> of Gallagher's ATK to a single target enemy. Reduces the target's ATK by <color=#f29e38ff><unbreak>#2[f1]%</unbreak></color>, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Salty Dog
eidolons.desc: When Gallagher enters the battle, regenerates <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> Energy and increases Effect RES by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Lion's Tail
eidolons.desc: When using the Skill, removes <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> debuff(s) from a target ally. At the same time, increases their Effect RES by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>, lasting for <unbreak>#3[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Corpse Reviver
eidolons.desc: Skill Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nBasic ATK Lv. +1, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>10</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Last Word
eidolons.desc: Extends the duration of the Besotted state inflicted by Gallagher's Ultimate by <unbreak>#1[i]</unbreak> turn(s).

eidolons.name: Death in the Afternoon
eidolons.desc: Ultimate Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.\nTalent Lv. +2, up to a maximum of Lv. <unbreak>15</unbreak>.

eidolons.name: Blood and Sand
eidolons.desc: Increases Gallagher's Break Effect by <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> and Weakness Break Efficiency by <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Novel Concoction
skillTree.desc: Increases this unit's Outgoing Healing by an amount equal to <unbreak>#1[i]%</unbreak> of Break Effect, up to a maximum Outgoing Healing increase of <unbreak>#2[i]%</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Organic Yeast
skillTree.desc: After using the Ultimate, immediately Advances Forward this unit's Action by <unbreak>100%</unbreak>.

skillTree.name: Bottoms Up
skillTree.desc: When Gallagher uses Nectar Blitz to attack Besotted enemies, the HP Restore effect of his Talent will also apply to other allies for this time.
